Vlad: Then, femme, that does not answer my question. What are you?

On his targetting system, the two independant crosshairs moved to be 
centered on her head.

Vlad: I am not from this world and I will consider any hostile move as 
an invitation to a challenge.

He would not say it, but secretly, he was terrified by the prospect. 
It seemed like his opponent was in a battle-armor of the kind he had 
never seen. But something about her made him feel as if she was not 
even a human.

--- In nbwrpg@y..., "airly2000" <airly2002@h...> wrote:
> ????
> 
> 
> "I'm a femme, haven't you noticed it??"said with a coquery smile the 
> femme while she left the pod and revelealed her body and face: Her 
> metallik skin mixed blue and silver. She has a silver, oval face, 
her 
> head was wearing a bejewelled herlmet. Her lips were tin and 
> delicates. Her eyes were blue and with an exotic spark. She seemed 
to 
> be delicate and strong at time. From hers back emerge two deep blue 
> bat-like wings and three dragon's head.
> 
>
